question: Which payment system is set to be made available round the clock from December 2020?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank has announced that the Real Time Gross Settlement System or the RTGS facility will be available round the clock, from December 14.
Last December, the RBI had made the NEFT service available 24x7.  As per the RBI, RTGS can be used for both domestic payments in Indian financial markets and cross-border payments.
